quotes.quote: Focus is the gateway to thinking clearly, and clear thinking is the gateway to true productivity.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The future depends on what you do today.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Your limitationâ€”it's only your imagination.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success doesn't just find you. You have to go out and get it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Little things make big things happen.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: It's going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Focus on progress, not perfection.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
quotes.author: Jimmy Johnson

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: You learn more from failure than from success. Don't let it stop you. Failure builds character.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: If you are working on something exciting that you really care about, you don't have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.
quotes.author: Rob Siltanen

quotes.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Entrepreneurs are great at dealing with uncertainty and also very good at minimizing risk. That's the classic entrepreneur.
quotes.author: Mohanbir Sawhney

quotes.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Wishing is not enough; we must do.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Imagine your life is perfect in every respect; what would it look like?
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: We generate fears while we sit. We overcome them by action.
quotes.author: Dr. Henry Link

quotes.quote: Whether you think you can or think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Security is mostly a superstition. Life is either a daring adventure or nothing.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The man who has confidence in himself gains the confidence of others.
quotes.author: Hasidic Proverb

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: What you lack in talent can be made up with desire, hustle and giving 110% all the time.
quotes.author: Don Zimmer

quotes.quote: Do what you can with all you have, wherever you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie
